net.minecraft.command

Interface ICommandSender

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClientPlayer, DedicatedServer, EntityClientPlayerMP, EntityOtherPlayerMP, EntityPlayer, EntityPlayerMP, EntityPlayerSP, FakePlayer, IntegratedServer, MinecraftServer, RConConsoleSource, TileEntityCommandBlock

    public interface ICommandSender

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canCommandSenderUseCommand(int i, java.lang.String s)
      Returns true if the command sender is allowed to use the given command.

      Gets the name of this command sender (usually username, but possibly "Rcon")
